data.title: Spotify.MLH
data.info: A lightweight VSCode extension which allows a developer to control Spotify without leaving their IDE.

data.title: MyMelier
data.stack: Javascript, React Native, Redux, Express, Sequelize
data.info: 'A sommelier in your pocket.' Mobile app built as a group project during my time at the Grace Hopper Program at Fullstack Academy.
